children.name: Has licence
desc: Is there a licence file at the root of the directory?

children.name: Has contributing
desc: Is there a contributing or development guide file at the root of the directory?

children.name: Has Readme
desc: Is there a readme file at the root of the directory?

children.name: Code of Conduct
desc: Is there an initiative and written document to regulate the behaviour of individuals? (e.g. code of conduct)
As an example, the Eclipse Foundation enforces the following code of conduct: https://www.eclipse.org/org/documents/Community_Code_of_Conduct.php .

children.name: Licences check
desc: Licences check on the code, as provided by tools like ScanCode (or Black Duck or..).
All licences found in the codebase that do not conform to a custom regexp are considered wrong. One should have as few as possible of them.
